scripts.dev: concurrently -n cli,srv,tsc,math -c cyan,red,red,blue 'npm run dev --workspace=polis-client' 'npm run start:dev --workspace=polis-server' 'npm run build:dev --workspace=polis-server' 'export $(cat .env) && cd math && clojure -M:run full'
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve:prod
scripts.build: rimraf server/build && npm run build:prod --workspace=polis-client && copyfiles -E -u 2 "client/build/**/*" server/dist/client && npm run build --workspace=polis-server
